root.input.points

Class FormatVectorsJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob
        • root.input.points.FormatVectorsJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    Deprecated.

    public class FormatVectorsJob
extends org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob

    This class takes an input directory storing vectorized data files and formats them in a usable fashion.

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
